title: Spaghetti Carbonara
prepSteps:
1. Boil spaghetti in salted water.
2. Cook pancetta until crispy.
3. Whisk eggs, Parmesan, and black pepper.
4. Toss hot pasta with egg mixture and pancetta.
5. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
prepSteps:
1. Cook chicken until golden.
2. Cook pasta until al dente.
3. Make Alfredo sauce with butter, cream, and Parmesan.
4. Combine chicken, pasta, and sauce.
5. Garnish with parsley and serve hot.

title: Mango Salsa Chicken
prepSteps:
1. Marinate chicken in mango salsa.
2. Grill or bake chicken until cooked.
3. Serve with extra mango salsa on top.
4. Garnish with cilantro and lime wedges.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
prepSteps:
1. Chop mixed vegetables like bell peppers, broccoli, and carrots.
2. Stir-fry veggies in sesame oil and soy sauce.
3. Add tofu or chicken for protein.
4. Serve over steamed rice or noodles.

title: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Herb Butter
prepSteps:
1. Season salmon fillets with salt, pepper, and herbs.
2. Grill salmon until flaky.
3. Make lemon herb butter with butter, lemon zest, and chopped herbs.
4. Serve salmon with lemon herb butter drizzled on top.

title: Caprese Salad
prepSteps:
1. Slice fresh tomatoes and mozzarella cheese.
2. Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate.
3. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
4. Sprinkle with fresh basil leaves.
5. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Shrimp Scampi
prepSteps:
1. Cook pasta until al dente.
2. Saut√© shrimp in garlic and butter until pink.
3. Add white wine and lemon juice.
4. Toss shrimp with cooked pasta.
5. Garnish with parsley and grated Parmesan.

title: Beef Tacos
prepSteps:
1. Season ground beef with taco seasoning.
2. Cook beef until browned.
3. Warm tortillas.
4. Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.
5. Serve with lime wedges.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
prepSteps:
1. Grill or bake chicken until cooked.
2. Chop Romaine lettuce and cherry tomatoes.
3. Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
4. Top with sliced chicken, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
5. Serve immediately.

title: Homemade Pizza
prepSteps:
1. Make pizza dough from scratch or use store-bought.
2. Roll out dough into a round shape.
3. Top with pizza sauce, cheese, and your favorite toppings.
4. Bake in a preheated oven until crust is golden.
5. Slice and enjoy!
